{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Ranga Ruānu |image = Portrait Chieftain Ruanu Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Ranga Ruānu.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Male |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = [Huana](/huana/) |deity = |personality = |class = Fighter |level = 8 |MIG = 15 |CON = 14 |DEX = 12 |PER = 10 |INT = 9 |RES = 10 |health = 152 |damage = 16-24 {{slash}}{{pierce}} |accuracy = 53 |penetration = 6 |deflection = 49 |fortitude = 59 |reflex = 45 |will = 34 |dr = 3 |ability = [Among the Waves](/amongTheWaves/), [Fast Runner](/fastRunnerDeadfire/), [One-Handed Style](/oneHandedStyleDeadfire/), [Two-Handed Style](/twoHandedStyleDeadfire/), [Weapon and Shield Style](/weaponAndShieldStyleDeadfire/), [Constant Recovery](/constantRecoveryDeadfire/), [Cleaving Stance](/cleavingStance/), [Confident Aim](/confidentAimDeadfire/), [Defender Stance](/defenderStance/), [Warrior Stance](/warriorStance/), [Disciplined Strikes](/disciplinedStrikes/), [Fearless](/fearlessDeadfire/), [Weapon Specialization](/weaponSpecialization/) |location = [Tikawara](/tikawara/), [Chieftain's Lodge](/chieftainsLodgeTikawara/) |quests = [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = [Copper Muzūma Shell Key](/copperMuzumaShellKey/) |body = Mataru Clothing |weapon1 = Sword (Deadfire){{!}}Sword |internalname = NPC_Tikawara_Chief_Ruanu |guid = f062e4fa-0197-4845-83e6-43d6d4ecfdb5 }} '''Ranga Ruānu''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|An aumaua huddles in close conversation with the warriors next to him. He whispers in a low, stern voice. No sooner do you catch his eye than he grins wide enough to stretch every muscle in his face.}} The head of Tikawara, Ruanu is plagued by the suffering his people experienced at the hands of slavers, raiders, and [Rauatai](/rauatai/). He is determined to succeed in the new location by leveraging the [Vailian Trading Company](/vailianTradingCompany/)'s proximity for protection. This sets him apart from many ranga in [Huana](/huana/) territories who are averse to foreigners. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/) |none = |other = * He evokes a few reactions from your companions. * You get unique dialogue if you pickpocket the key, when he goes to hand it to you. }} ## =Quests = * [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/): He gives you the [Copper Muzūma Shell Key](/copperMuzumaShellKey/) when you promise to investigate [Poko Kohara](/pokoKohara/). ## Companion reactivity After asking him ''"How is Poko Kohara causing storms?"'', the ranga explains that it is of Ngati's doing, in her defense of the adra. {| class="wikitable" ! width="100px" | Companion ! width="100%" | Dialogue |- | [Pallegina](/pallegina/) | At the implication of divine providence, Pallegina's right eye twitches in annoyance, the membrane flicking out and back. Fighting against it, she forces a weak smile and nods politely. {{hr}} To which the Ranga responds:
''Cocking his head to the side, Ruānu mirrors the gesture with a full smile. He seem to be puzzling out Pallegina's reaction.'' |} After asking him if there is danger beyond the storms, he briefly talks about "another people" living alongside his ancestors, and that the only thing there now is death. {| class="wikitable" ! width="100px" | Companion ! width="100%" | Dialogue |- | [Aloth](/aloth/) | ''"That does tend to follow the Engwithans."'' |} After he says: ''"Our village here is young still, but we will grow when the Vailians come."'' {| class="wikitable" ! width="100px" | Companion ! width="100%" | Dialogue |- | [Tekēhu](/tekehu/) | ''"Ekera, like an ingrown toenail."'' {{hr}} To which the Ranga responds:
''"For what does Ngati's chosen protest? Give Tikawara a chance to prove itself!"'' |} After saying ''"You don't seem to mind the Vailian influence here."'' (only if you didn't destroy the adra pillar), he responds with: :''"Some tribes push the foreigners away, but it is good to have powerful friends." A frown briefly clouds his expression.'' {| class="wikitable" ! width="100px" | Companion ! width="100%" | Dialogue |- | [Aloth](/aloth/) | ''"Powerful friends have a way of extracting costly favors, don't they, [Player Name]?" He gives you a sidelong glance.'' |- | [Pallegina](/pallegina/) | (Pro-Valian Republics, Minor)
"The Company can be a good friend to helpful partners, even out here." She nods warmly toward Ruānu. |- | [Edér](/eder/) | ''"We got plenty of those. Ours are holding our lives ransom and playing us against their enemies."'' |- |} After asking if he's always this friendly, or after the above if you question Tikawara's ability to support more people (the latter only after starting [Plucked Fruit](/pluckedFruit/)). {| class="wikitable" ! width="100px" | Companion ! width="100%" | Dialogue |- | [Edér](/eder/) | ''"You sure you wanna question that? We never get nice ones like this."'' |} Upon giving him [Beza's Pages](/bezasPages/), during [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/), claiming that the Vailians would've used the souls of the tribe to power the machines in Poko Kohara, and after he puts it away in fear of the news spreading. {| class="wikitable" ! width="100px" | Companion ! width="100%" | Dialogue |- | [Pallegina](/pallegina/) | (Minor Negative Reputation Lost)
"Sciòderie! One woman's fevered notes do not represent the Company's plans!" Her lip curls in annoyance and her feathers stand on end. |- | [Aloth](/aloth/) | If he decided to take Thaos' place in {{poe1}}:
''You're responsible for your tribe and you're just going to... pretend you didn't see this?!"'' {{hr}} If he decided to dismantle the [Leaden Key](/leadenKey/) in {{poe1}}:
''"You're going to trust your fate to the goodwill of animancers?!"'' {{hr}} To which the ranga responds:
''"And what do you know of the choices before me, Aedyran?" He gives Aloth a contemptuous glare before turning back to you.'' |} [Category:Tikawara characters](/categoryTikawaraCharacters/)
